mapper.select: SELECT edi_code, inp_emp_code, inp_emp_name, edi_type_name, edi_status_name, inp_date, edi_title, edi_contents, edi_status, edi_type FROM ( SELECT a.edi_code, a.inp_emp_code, a.edi_status, a.edi_type, (SELECT emp_name FROM emp_list b WHERE b.emp_code = a.inp_emp_code) AS inp_emp_name, (SELECT code_name FROM common_code_map b WHERE b.column_id = 'EDI_TYPE' AND b.code_id = a.edi_TYPE) AS edi_type_name, (SELECT code_name FROM common_code_map b WHERE b.column_id = 'EDI_STATUS' AND b.code_id = a.EDI_STATUS) AS edi_status_name, inp_date, edi_title, edi_contents, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY edi_code DESC) AS rNum FROM edi_master a ORDER BY a.edi_code DESC ) WHERE 1=1 AND rNum BETWEEN (#{ countPerPage } * (#{ page } - 1)) + 1 AND (#{ countPerPage } * (#{ page } - 1)) + #{ countPerPage }

SELECT a.edi_code, a.inp_emp_code, a.edi_status, a.edi_type, (SELECT emp_name FROM emp_list b WHERE b.emp_code = a.inp_emp_code) AS inp_emp_name, (SELECT code_name FROM common_code_map b WHERE b.column_id = 'EDI_TYPE' AND b.code_id = a.edi_TYPE) AS edi_type_name, (SELECT code_name FROM common_code_map b WHERE b.column_id = 'EDI_STATUS' AND b.code_id = a.EDI_STATUS) AS edi_status_name, (SELECT dept_code FROM emp_list WHERE emp_code = a.inp_emp_code) AS dept_code, (SELECT dept_name FROM dept_list WHERE dept_code = (SELECT dept_code FROM emp_list WHERE emp_code = a.inp_emp_code)) AS dept_name, inp_date, edi_title, edi_contents FROM edi_master a WHERE a.edi_code = #{ edi_code }

SELECT EDI_CODE, EDI_SEQ, SETT_EMP_CODE, EDI_COMMENTS, EDI_SETT_STATUS, INP_DATE, (SELECT EMP_NAME FROM EMP_LIST WHERE EMP_CODE = SETT_EMP_CODE) AS SETT_EMP_NAME, (SELECT DEPT_CODE FROM DEPT_LIST WHERE DEPT_CODE = (SELECT DEPT_CODE FROM EMP_LIST WHERE EMP_CODE = SETT_EMP_CODE)) AS SETT_DEPT_CODE, (SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM DEPT_LIST WHERE DEPT_CODE = (SELECT DEPT_CODE FROM EMP_LIST WHERE EMP_CODE = SETT_EMP_CODE)) AS SETT_DEPT_NAME, (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM COMMON_CODE_MAP WHERE COLUMN_ID = 'EDI_STATUS' AND CODE_ID = a.EDI_SETT_STATUS) AS EDI_SETT_STATUS_NAME FROM edi_sett a WHERE EDI_CODE = #{ ediCode }

SELECT COWORK_DEPT_CODE, EDI_COWORK_STATUS, EDI_COWORK_COMMENTS, INP_EMP_CODE, (SELECT EMP_NAME FROM EMP_LIST WHERE EMP_CODE = b.inp_emp_code) AS INP_EMP_NAME, (SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM DEPT_LIST WHERE DEPT_CODE = a.COWORK_DEPT_CODE) AS COWORK_DEPT_NAME, (SELECT MGR_EMP_CODE FROM DEPT_LIST WHERE DEPT_CODE = a.COWORK_DEPT_CODE) AS MGR_EMP_CODE FROM EDI_COWORK_DEPT a, EDI_MASTER b WHERE 1=1 AND a.EDI_CODE = b.EDI_CODE AND a.EDI_CODE = #{ ediCode }
SELECT INFORM_DEPT_CODE, (SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM DEPT_LIST WHERE DEPT_CODE = a.INFORM_DEPT_CODE) AS INFORM_DEPT_NAME FROM EDI_INFORM_DEPT a WHERE a.EDI_CODE = #{ ediCode }
